# [FEAT] Article Management System

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement a comprehensive article management system for the knowledge base and help center.

## Requirements

### Article Editor
- Rich text editor (WYSIWYG)
- Markdown support
- Image embedding
- Video embedding
- Code blocks with syntax highlighting
- Table support
- Anchor links

### Article Properties
- Title and body
- URL slug
- Meta description (SEO)
- Author attribution
- Publication status (draft/published)
- Publication date scheduling
- Expiration date

### Article Organization
- Categories and sections
- Tags/labels
- Article ordering
- Related articles
- Article series/collections

### Versioning
- Article revision history
- Version comparison (diff)
- Restore previous versions
- Draft vs. published versions
- Approval workflow

### Article Features
- Internal vs. external articles
- Access restrictions by user segment
- Article feedback (helpful/not helpful)
- View count tracking
- Print-friendly version

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk Guide allows you to build a vast knowledge base with articles, guides, manuals, and FAQs.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Rich text editor works
- [ ] Article versioning available
- [ ] Categories/tags functional
- [ ] Publishing workflow works
- [ ] Analytics tracked
